predicate.note: Frames file for 'slump' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. Verbnet entries 47.6 and 50, other framed members include sit and stand, lie. Comparison to fall etc.

roleset.name: decline

example.name: didn't believe me, did you?
example.text: In the auto sector, Bayerische Motoren Werke plunged 14.5 marks to 529 marks ($288), Daimler-Benz dropped 10.5 to 700, and Volkswagen slumped 9 to 435.5.

roleset.note: I think you can say that.
